metadata.case_name: Multi-generational Gift with Chain of Wealth

extracted_fields.donor_source_of_wealth: Sale of manufacturing business (Anderson Industrial Supplies) in 2003 for approximately £4 million
extracted_fields.reason_for_gift: Inheritance tax planning and desire to see grandchildren benefit during his lifetime

level_1_source.nature_of_business: Manufacturing industrial fasteners for automotive companies

donor_wealth_chain.chain_completeness: Complete - clear origin of donor's wealth established

summary.notes: Excellent documentation of gift including full chain to donor's original source of wealth. Gift letter and bank statements mentioned as supporting evidence.

compliance_notes.inheritance_tax_considerations: Gift made as part of IHT planning - 7 year rule applies
compliance_notes.pattern_of_giving: Donor has made similar gifts to two cousins in 2020 and 2021
